values: （围绕地球的）大气；大气圈；大气层；（房间或其他场所内的）空气；气氛；环境；情调；感染力

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器

word_group.brief_definition: 建设性的氛围；积极气氛
良好的气氛；良好的氛围
派对气氛；派对的气氛；聚会的气氛
融洽的气氛；惬意的气氛
调节空气；人造大气；人工气候

bilingual.source: Then the spaceship will re-enter the Earth's atmosphere.
bilingual.target: 然后宇宙飞船将重新进入地球大气层。
水星的大气层非常稀薄。

bilingual.source: The atmosphere is made up of several layers.
I love the relaxed atmosphere of this café.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢这家咖啡馆的轻松大气。

bilingual.source: The atmosphere of this restaurant is very romantic.
bilingual.target: 这家餐厅的大气非常浪漫。

bilingual.source: The factory emits toxic gases into the atmosphere.
bilingual.target: 工厂向大气中排放有毒气体。

bilingual.source: The factory emits toxic gasses into the atmosphere.
bilingual.target: 工厂向大气中排放有毒气体。

bilingual.source: Oxygen in the atmosphere is essential for life.
bilingual.target: 大气层中的氧气对生命至关重要。

list.abstract: Atmosphere是来自Minneapolis的一个Hip Hop团体，以饶舌乐手Slug为中心。 自1998年的首张专辑《Overcast!》之后，Atmosphere始终在全美各地和海外不停的巡演，并依靠频繁的演出而确立了坚实的乐迷基础，逐渐成长为美国独立Hip Hop阵营的代表团体。

yingyinNormal.en: They and their ancestors created our life-giving atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 植物及其先祖改造出生命赖以存活的大气。

yingyinNormal.en: This battlefield gave rise to an atmosphere, stormy, red with nitrogen, carbon and hydrogen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撞击产生了大气，大气翻腾，因含有氮、碳、氢而显得通红。

yingyinNormal.en: Earth's atmosphere is 80 percent nitrogen. We don't even breathe nitrogen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球的大气层80%都是氮气，可我们不呼吸氮气。

yingyinNormal.en: Not what he said. Using atmosphere as thrust. What happens if we blow the VAL?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是他说的那个，用大气作为助推，要是把阀门给炸了会怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: In just a few hours, they're going to launch them into orbit. And bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几小时之后，把它们载入到轨道，把赛博坦运到我们的大气层。

yingyinNormal.en: The hull's mostly there to keep the air. Mars atmosphere is so thin, you don't need a lot of streamlining.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外壳是为了保持舱内的空气，火星的大气很薄，不需要让机舱太流线化。

yingyinNormal.en: We started detecting gravitational anomalies almost 50 years ago. Mostly small distortions to our instruments in the upper atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从五十年前就开始探测到引力异常现象，多数是小的畸变，在大气层上层的仪器中。

yingyinNormal.en: Complete loss of pressure boiled off most of the water. Any bacteria that survived died in the subzero temperatures when exposed to Mar's atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全失压，大部分水都沸腾掉了，之前活下来的细菌都在零下温度中死掉了，暴露在火星的大气里就会这样。

yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.zh: 西岸的空气质量幸免于难。

yingyinNormal.en: If humans say so. You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，如果人类同意的话，你不能把大规模杀伤武器运到我们的地盘。

yingyinNormal.en: What I do do is manage to, create an atmosphere of support for the people working with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会支援为我工作的人。

yingyinNormal.en: You were behaving so strangely. They say you were trying to get under the furniture. Talking about the atmosphere?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当时的行为非常奇怪，他们说你当时要钻到家具下面去，嘴里说什么潮湿毛球。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: The problem along the west coast is that there are mountains which are blocking the path. And so the atmosphere looks for channels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 西海岸一代的问题在于那儿都是大山挡住了道路，风能项目需建在河道处。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you get kicked out? No, I just needed to leave. Just the atmosphere. And the cups. Hey, I was right on Sean's trail. Then I lost him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你被踢出来了吗？不，我只是必需离开。因为他的杯子。嘿，我已经跟在肖恩的背后了，但是我还是失去他了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the backstage area where all the performers gather before heading out onto the route. And there is definitely an atmosphere of anticipation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是后台准备区，演员们出发到路上前都聚集在这里。这儿绝对有一种充满期待的气氛。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet

examination_example.sentence: Mauna Kea's peak rises above the bulk of our planet's dense <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>, where conditions allow telescopes to obtain images of unsurpassed clarity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫纳克亚山的顶峰高耸于地球大部分稠密的大气层之上，那里的条件使得望远镜能够获取无比清晰的图像。

sense_info_list.en: the pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or work of art

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大气的；有浪漫氛围的

word_family.mean: n. 大气层；气氛；环境；艺术氛围；情调；感染力；空气

sense_info_list.en: the pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or work of art

examination_example.sentence: But that would be based on an <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> of mutual trust, wouldn't it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但那是基于相互信任的氛围，不是吗？

examination_example.sentence: Without an <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> of trust, feedback can create stress and self-doubt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有信任的氛围，反馈会产生压力和自我怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: Yet sophisticated statistics are used to create an intimidatory <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> of scientific certainty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，复杂的统计数据被用来营造一种科学确定性的可怕氛围。

sense_info_list.en: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大气的；有浪漫氛围的

word_family.mean: n. 大气层；气氛；环境；艺术氛围；情调；感染力；空气

sense_info_list.en: the pervading tone or mood of a place; situation; or work of art

examination_example.sentence: On one side are white parents like Catherine Foley, a former president of the Parent-Teacher-Student Association at her daughter's middle school, who has come to see the district's increasingly pressured <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> as opposed to learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方是像凯瑟琳·福利这样的白人家长，她曾在女儿所在的中学担任家长——教师——学生协会主席。她认为，该学区日益紧张的氛围不利于孩子们学习。

examination_example.sentence: But for speaking, there really is no substitute for trying to speak and use the language in a relaxed <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是对于说话来说，在轻松的气氛中说话和使用语言是无可替代的。

sense_info_list.en: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet

examination_example.sentence: The beans would then be roasted in the heat generated by the craft's 20-minute re-entry into Earth's <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，这些豆子将在飞船重返地球大气层 20 分钟所产生的热量中烘烤。

examination_example.sentence: Arrhenius calculated the capability of carbon dioxide to trap heat in the Earth's <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>, but other chemists disagreed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Arrhenius计算了二氧化碳在地球大气中捕获热量的能力，但其他化学家并不认同。

examination_example.sentence: When ships power their way through the ocean, they pump exhaust into the <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>, just as cars do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当船只在海洋上行驶时，它们会像汽车一样将废气排放到大气中。

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or work of art

examination_example.sentence: It's affordable, and it's got a fun <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> without being too noisy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它价格合理，气氛有趣，又不太吵闹。

examination_example.sentence: Does Kilimanjaro deserve its reputation as a crowded mountain with lines of tourists ruining the <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> of peace?
examination_example.sentence_trans: “喧嚣拥挤，安谧不再”，乞力马扎罗山真的堪当此名吗？

sense_info_list.en: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大气的；有浪漫氛围的

word_family.mean: n. 大气层；气氛；环境；艺术氛围；情调；感染力；空气

sense_info_list.en: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet

examination_example.sentence: Because the capsule remains within the Earth's <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> (大气层), no special clothing or training are needed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于太空舱仍留在地球大气层中，因此不需要特殊的衣服或训练。

examination_example.sentence: But nitrous oxide can stay in the <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> more than 100 years which can change the climate a lot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但一氧化二氮可以在大气中停留100多年，这会极大地改变气候。

examination_example.sentence: In the upper parts of the <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>, it will burn up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大气层的上部，它会燃烧起来。

sense_info_list.en: the pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or work of art

examination_example.sentence: In China, it's natural and important for a host (主人) to make a lively <highlight>atmosphere</highlight> (气氛).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，主人营造热闹的气氛是很自然也很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: Well, for me it comes down to a perfect balance of delicious food, pleasant <highlight>atmosphere</highlight>（氛围）and a near perfect location.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，这归根结底是美味食物、愉快的氛围和近乎完美的地理位置的完美平衡。

sample.mean: n. 探海球；深海球形潜水器
